Container.Name: ShareX Uploader
Container.Overview:
This server allows you to easily upload ShareX screenshots and videos. It includes token authentication for security and can handle various image file types by converting them to WebP format for efficient storage.
View the Git page: https://git.fascinated.cc/Fascinated/sharex-php-uploader

Config.Name: FILES_LOCATION
Config.Description: Where you want the uploaded files to be stored.

Config.Name: Max Upload Size
Config.Description: The max upload size of files in megabytes. Eg: 500M

Config.Name: Upload Secrets
Config.Description: You can add multiple secrets. Format: secret1,secret2,secret3

Config.Name: Upload Directory
Config.Description: The upload directory (If you don't know what this is, ignore it)

Config.Name: Use Random File Names
Config.Description: Use random file names instead of the original file name.

Config.Name: Should Convert to Webp
Config.Description: Should the script convert images to webp?

Config.Name: Webp Quality
Config.Description: The quality of the webp image (0-100)

Config.Name: Webp Threadhold
Config.Description: The minimum file size for converting to webp (in bytes)

Config.Name: File Name Length
Config.Description: The length of the random file name

Config.Name: Server Port
Config.Description: The port to connect to the application on.
